participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative, sociable, and a bit anxious about his future.
participant_1.background: I will continue to play music with my friends to help relieve stress and enjoy myself. I try to keep in touch with my family, but I can be busy with school and my job. I enjoy cooking but not baking. I can speak Arabic, English, and French. My biggest fear is that I will work myself up so much that I will become ill.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Energetic, passionate about education, and loves expressing herself through art.
participant_2.background: I'm going to spend time with my family and friends. I just graduated college with my bachelor’s degree in education. I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success. I draw comics. I like to dance with my friends.

content.text: Hello! I'm so excited to be here.
Hello! I'm excited to be here too.
What are you doing this summer?
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds fun! I'm going to spend time with my family and friends too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, cook, and read.
I like to draw comics and dance with my friends.
That sounds fun! I love to dance too.
What's your favorite song to dance to?
I love to dance to "Happy" by Pharrell Williams.
That's a great song! I love to dance to that song too.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! I'm sure we'll have a lot of fun together this summer.
